Package hw03.gizzon.battleship

Class BattleshipClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw03.gizzon.battleship.BattleshipClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable
    public class BattleshipClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connectable
    The BattleshipClient class is used for the peer connection. This class will control the connection with the server, dealing with commands, and I/O streams.

      static int DEFAULT_PORT

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BattleshipClient​(java.lang.String server)
      The battleshipclient constructor will call another constructor that takes in the user's port
      BattleshipClient​(java.lang.String server, int port)
      The battleshipclient constructor sets the respective port and server.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void connect()
      The connect() function establishes a connection between the client and the server.

      The getPort() function is used to return the port
      java.lang.String getServer()
      The getServer() function is used to return the server
      boolean isConnectionClosed()
      The connectionClosed() function is used to ensure the connection was established
      java.lang.String receive()
      The receive() function is used so the server can recieve messages

        port - Server's port

             throws java.io.IOException
